.
Action Taken by SSA Upon Receipt of VA Notice of a Child’s Approaching 18
th
Birthday
Upon receipt of the notice sent by VA, SSA furnishes VA with the following:
a copy of a letter concerning termination of benefits that would be sent to the beneficiary if they were being paid by SSA
an amended certification, if required, for the remaining beneficiaries, and
a copy of the letter that SSA would send the remaining beneficiaries, if they were being paid by that agency, together with enclosures.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section D - Authorization and Notification for the Special Allowance Under 38 U.S.C. 1312(a)
